author: Harry Craddock
description: Stir or shake (as originally stipulated in The Savoy Cocktail Book) this cocktail is still boozy. However, it's also wonderfully aromatic with all three ingredients combining harmoniously.
name: Twelve Miles Out Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
